flawed_nl_solution:
The number of apples remaining after Jack gave his father 10 is 55 - 10 = <<55-10=40>>40.
The share each one of his friends including him will get is 40 / 5 = <<40/5=8.0>>8.0.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 40. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
